20110119022947.000|20110119022949.000|CC1|A HORRIBLE FALL, A 39-YEAR-OLD

20110119023003.000|20110119023004.000|CC1|HE'S A SPECIAL AGENT AT THE     
20110119023004.000|20110119023005.000|CC1|NATIONAL INSURANCE CRIME BUREAU 
20110119023005.000|20110119023006.000|CC1|IN CHICAGO.                     
20110119023006.000|20110119023008.000|CC1|>> IT'S EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO  
20110119023008.000|20110119023009.000|CC1|PROVE BECAUSE THE PERSON DID

20110119023016.000|20110119023017.000|CC1|>> Reporter: OCCASIONALLY,      
20110119023017.000|20110119023018.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS GET LUCKY.        
20110119023018.000|20110119023019.000|CC1|THERE'S SURVEILLANCE VIDEO.     
20110119023019.000|20110119023021.000|CC1|TAKE THE CASE OF THE JUICE MAN, 
20110119023021.000|20110119023022.000|CC1|MICHAEL RINEHART, IN SOUTH      
20110119023022.000|20110119023023.000|CC1|CAROLINA.                       
20110119023023.000|20110119023024.000|CC1|HE SLIPS IN SOME ORANGE JUICE AT
20110119023024.000|20110119023026.000|CC1|A GROCERY, BUT REWIND THE TAPE, 
20110119023026.000|20110119023027.000|CC1|AND SEE HE FIDDLES WITH A WET   
20110119023027.000|20110119023029.000|CC1|FLOOR CONE, TAKES THE JUICE FROM
20110119023029.000|20110119023030.000|CC1|THE CART, AND POURS IT ON THE   
20110119023030.000|20110119023031.000|CC1|FLOOR.                          
20110119023031.000|20110119023033.000|CC1|ALL THAT'S LEFT TO DO IS STASH  
20110119023033.000|20110119023035.000|CC1|THE BOTTLE, WALK BACK, AND SLIDE
20110119023035.000|20110119023037.000|CC1|DOWN INTO THE PUDDLE HE MADE.   
20110119023037.000|20110119023038.000|CC1|HE HOPED THE ACT WAS WORTH      
20110119023038.000|20110119023040.000|CC1|$8,000.                         
20110119023040.000|20110119023042.000|CC1|ALL HE GOT WAS A TRIP TO JAIL.  
20110119023042.000|20110119023043.000|CC1|OFTEN THE SCAMMERS WORK WITH    
20110119023043.000|20110119023045.000|CC1|PARTNERS.                       
20110119023045.000|20110119023046.000|CC1|MEET THE "HAIR PAIR,"           
20110119023046.000|20110119023048.000|CC1|72-YEAR-OLD JOHNELLA HOWARD AND 
20110119023048.000|20110119023051.000|CC1|HER CARETAKER SUSAN SNOW.       
20110119023051.000|20110119023052.000|CC1|HOWARD APPEARS TO SUFFER A      
20110119023052.000|20110119023053.000|CC1|FRIGHTENING FALL, BUT REWIND,   
20110119023053.000|20110119023055.000|CC1|AND WATCH AS SHE FIRST SMEARS   
20110119023055.000|20110119023057.000|CC1|WATER AROUND WITH HER FOOT.     
20110119023057.000|20110119023059.000|CC1|SNOW, HER PARTNER IN CRIME,

20110119023101.000|20110119023103.000|CC1|AND THAT FALL, IT'S MORE LIKE A 
20110119023103.000|20110119023104.000|CC1|SIT.                            
20110119023104.000|20110119023106.000|CC1|HOWARD EVEN ADJUSTS HER HAIR    
20110119023107.000|20110119023107.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:31:00 of 1:00:00
20110119023106.000|20110119023108.000|CC1|BEFORE GETTING INTO POSITION.   
20110119023108.000|20110119023110.000|CC1|THE PAIR TRIED FOR $300,000.    
20110119023110.000|20110119023112.000|CC1|INSTEAD, THEY GOT PROSECUTED AND
20110119023112.000|20110119023113.000|CC1|BANNED FROM THE GROCERY FOR     
20110119023113.000|20110119023114.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20110119023114.000|20110119023115.000|CC1|VIDEO EVIDENCE OR NOT, 2010     
20110119023115.000|20110119023117.000|CC1|COULD BE A RECORD YEAR FOR      
20110119023117.000|20110119023119.000|CC1|SUSPICIOUS SLIP-AND-FALLS.      
20110119023119.000|20110119023120.000|CC1|THAT'S ACCORDING TO NEW DATA    
20110119023120.000|20110119023122.000|CC1|PROVIDED TO CBS NEWS.           
20110119023122.000|20110119023124.000|CC1|THE INSURANCE CRIME BUREAU ALONE
20110119023124.000|20110119023126.000|CC1|WORKED 469 CASES THE FIRST HALF 
20110119023126.000|20110119023127.000|CC1|OF THE YEAR.                    
20110119023127.000|20110119023129.000|CC1|IF THE TREND HOLDS, THE BUREAU

20110119023131.000|20110119023132.000|CC1|OVER 2008.

20110119023134.000|20110119023136.000|CC1|BIG STORES OR BY THE INSURANCE  
20110119023136.000|20110119023138.000|CC1|COMPANIES, IT'S DOLLARS THAT    
20110119023138.000|20110119023142.000|CC1|CAME OUT OF CONSUMERS' POCKETS.

20110119023208.000|20110119023210.000|CC1|OLIVE OIL WOMAN STRIKES.

20110119023212.000|20110119023214.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS MOMENTS BEFORE.
